front.title: Supplement to 802.3 - Layer Management for 10 Mb/s Baseband Repeaters (Section 19)
front.abstract: The supplement to ISO/IEC 8802-3: 1992 [ANSI/IEEE Std 802.3, 1992 Edition] defines a set of mechanisms that enable management of ISO/IEC 8802-3 10 Mb/s baseband repeater units. The managed objects are defined in accordance with IEEE 802.1 and ISO/IEC standards for network management.
